definition: to receive/to accept/to enjoy/to bring into/to pay (tax etc)/nano- (one billionth)/to reinforce sole of shoes or stockings by close sewing

sentences.english: The production processes of nanosilver antibacterial shoe material were introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了纳米银抗菌针刺鞋材的生产过程。

sentences.english: The nanocrystalline TiO2 film is sensitized by dyestuff with dip and absorption.
sentences.chinese: 采用浸渍吸附法对纳米晶二氧化钛薄膜进行染料敏化。

sentences.english: Nano-crystallization of metallic glasses is an effective way to prepare nanocrystalline materials.
sentences.chinese: 而非晶合金晶化法是纳米晶材料的主要制备方法之一。

sentences.english: PVD process is an important method for manufacturing flaky aluminium nano powder.
sentences.chinese: PVD法是目前制备纳米片状铝粉的主要方法。

sentences.english: Finding a thread for the nanoscopic needle to pull required more thinking.
sentences.chinese: 要给纳米碳管找到合适的线则需要更多的思考。
但“纳米细菌”是否真正存在呢？

sentences.english: The synthesis of carbon nanotubes was conducted in a quartz tube furnace.
sentences.chinese: 碳纳米管的合成是在石英管式炉中完成。

sentences.english: The result showed that nanoscale silver has evidently inhibitory effects on testing bacteria.
sentences.chinese: 结果表明，纳米银对供试菌种有较为明显的抑制作用。

sentences.english: The dominant influence on specific saturation magnetism is attributed to nanocrystalline.
sentences.chinese: 对饱和磁化强度的影响占主导地位的是纳米晶相。

sentences.english: This is because the palladium nanoparticles continued to release trapped electrons.
sentences.chinese: 这是因为钯纳米颗粒在不断地释放捕获的电子。

sentences.english: It can be predicted that water-based nano-diamond polishing slurry will gain more attention and applications.
sentences.chinese: 水基纳米金刚石抛光液可能是未来抛光液的发展方向。

sentences.english: Physical, Chemical, & Nano Sciences Center, Sandia National Laboratories, New Mexico.
sentences.chinese: 美国桑迪亚国家实验室物理，化学，纳米科学中心。

sentences.english: Nami technology is one of the top technologies in this century.
sentences.chinese: 纳米技术是本世纪最重要的高新技术之一。

sentences.english: TSMC has admitted to trouble getting its 40nm process up and running.
sentences.chinese: 台积电已经承认麻烦的40纳米工艺和运行。

sentences.english: Thirdly the nanoporous random laser is brought forward.
sentences.chinese: 提出了纳米孔隙随机激光器的设想。

sentences.english: or Raman reporter molecule immobilized metallic nanoparticles.
sentences.chinese: 拉曼，报导了固定化的分子金属纳米粒。
